de.mrapp.android.dialog.animation

Class CircleTransitionAnimation.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mrapp.android.dialog.builder.AbstractBuilder<AnimationType,BuilderType>
      • de.mrapp.android.dialog.animation.DrawableAnimation.AbstractDrawableAnimationBuilder<AnimationType,BuilderType>
        • de.mrapp.android.dialog.animation.BackgroundAnimation.AbstractBackgroundAnimationBuilder<CircleTransitionAnimation,CircleTransitionAnimation.Builder>
          • de.mrapp.android.dialog.animation.CircleTransitionAnimation.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    CircleTransitionAnimation

    public static class CircleTransitionAnimation.Builder
extends BackgroundAnimation.AbstractBackgroundAnimationBuilder<CircleTransitionAnimation,CircleTransitionAnimation.Builder>
    A builder, which allows to create animations, which can be used to change backgrounds by animating the new background as a circle, which grows from a specific position.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Builder(android.content.Context context)
      Creates a new builder, which allows to create animations, which can be used to change backgrounds by animating the new background as a circle, which grows from a specific position.
